div.p: Abstract top level class in the CIMI hierarchy. The Locatable class reflects CIMI's implementation using Archetype Description Language (ADL). Its attributes (archetype_node_id, name, and archetype_details) are necessary to serialize CIMI definitions in ADL, but have no clinical relevance. To avoid complicating the profiles with irrelevant extensions, the attributes of Locatable have been omitted.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
